alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 28 at 7:43AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH TONIGHT... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rainfall is possible WHERE...All Islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Tonight IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties as well as possible landslides/rockslides. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mid-level trough west of American Samoa will continue to bring scattered thunderstorms and heavy rainfall in the area through tonight. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 740 Taeao Aso Lua Tesema 28 2021 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE PO NANEI... MAFUAAGA...E ono iai ni timuga mamafa e aafia ai le atunuu ma e ono faatupulaia ai tulaga o tafega ma lologa. NOFOAGA...Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le po nanei AAFIAGA...O tulaga o tafega ma lologa o le a faatupulaia ona o fetaia`iga o savili i saute o le atunu`u. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau i sisifo o le atunu`u ua mafua ai ona tetele timuga ma faititili i luga o le atusamoa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
